mapper.insert: insert into plans(start_date, end_date, sido_code, gugun_code, member_id, plan_title) values (#{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{sidoCode}, #{gugunCode}, #{memberId}, #{planTitle})
insert into plan_detail(visit_date, visit_order, plan_id, content_id) values (#{visitDate}, #{visitOrder}, #{planId}, #{contentId})
mapper.select: select plan_id, plan_title, start_date, end_date, m.member_id, m.member_password, m.member_email, m.member_name, m.sido_code as member_sido_code, m.gugun_code as member_gugun_code, m.member_photo, m.member_birthdate, m.member_gender, m.member_phone, m.member_role, s.sido_code, s.sido_name, g.gugun_code, g.gugun_name from plans p join members m on m.member_id = p.member_id join gugun g on g.sido_code = p.sido_code and g.gugun_code = p.gugun_code join sido s on s.sido_code = g.sido_code where p.plan_id = #{planId}
